snippet.title: TT Isle of Man - Sidecar Thrill DLC
snippet.description:
The sidecar DLC is now available for free on PS4, Xbox One and PC!
In this new trailer, we find out how Estelle Leblond (TT sidecar rider) worked with the studio in order to recreate the sensations of this very unique competition.

Please note that this DLC will be available for free until 22 June. Afterwards it will be available as a paid-for DLC pack, so don't wait for too long!

-------------------------------
